name: Taxi Journey - Windows, Wii U, PSVita, PSN, XBLA & more
blurb: Taxi Journey is an original adventure game with unique graphics and an original gameplay

rewards.reward: No Reward

SUPPORTER - THANK YOU!\r\n==============================\r\nYou will give us your feedback during the whole production of the game because we want you to be part of the team + 20 AMAZING DIGITAL ARTWORKS + 10 BEAUTIFUL WALLPAPERS. And each time we\u2019ll take a taxi, we\u2019ll think of you :)

==============================

============================== 
If you want to know all about the creatures, monsters and characters of Taxi Journey with their strengths and weaknesses, this pack is for you!

OFFICIAL T-SHIRT (add-on or stand alone)
FREE SHIPPING
 ==============================
NOTE: This is a stand-alone tier and does not include a copy of the game, and it is NOT included on any of the upper tiers.
If you want to get a T-shirt on top of your current pledge tier, just manage your pledge and add an extra $30 on top of it and we'll ask you when we send the survey about if you want a T-Shirt for the the extra $30, as well as for the size for your T-shirt.

SPECIAL SET OF TAXI JOURNEY PLAYING CARDS (add-on or stand alone) FREE SHIPPING  ==============================\r\nThis is a stand-alone tier and does not include a copy of the game, and it is NOT included on any of the upper tiers.\r\nIf you want to get a special set of Taxi Journey Playing Cards on top of your current pledge tier, just manage your pledge and add an extra $30 on top of it and we'll ask you when we send the survey about if you want a special set of Taxi Journey Playing Cards for the the extra $30

If you want to get the artbook on top of your current pledge tier, just manage your pledge and add an extra $30 on top of it and we'll ask you when we send the survey about if you want the artbook for the the extra $30

ALL-DIGITAL REWARD SET
============================== 
Download the game at launch!1 DIGITAL COPY OF TAXI JOURNEY + DIGITAL COMPANION BOOK + DIGITAL ARTBOOK
 + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + 20 AMAZING DIGITAL ARTWORKS + 10 BEAUTIFUL WALLPAPERS .
============================== 
With this pack, you'll get all the behind-the-scenes secrets and you will see how deep the world of Taxi Journey is! With the Companion book, you'll discover all the details about the creatures, the monsters and the characters of Taxi Journey with their strengths and weaknesses. With the Artbook, you will discover exclusive artworks with comments from the artists and authors and step-by-step examples of how our artists work.

PHYSICAL GAME BOX ** EARLY BIRD - FREE SHIPPING ** ============================== BOXED COPY OF THE GAME (Windows) +  1 DIGITAL COPY (ANY PLATFORM if its stretch goal is reached) + DIGITAL COMPANION BOOK + DIGITAL ARTBOOK + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + 20 AMAZING DIGITAL ARTWORKS + 10 BEAUTIFUL WALLPAPERS\r\n==============================\r\nWith this pack, you've got it all. If you love collectors and like to have beautiful boxed-copies that you can keep for years, this pack is for you!

CUSTOM ARTWORK PACK (NEW TIER)\r\n============================== This pack is the same as the ART DIRECTOR PACK but with a major difference. You don't have a printed framed artwork but an Original artwork signed by the artist!

CUSTOM ARTWORK PACK\r\n============================== \r\nThis pack is the same as the ART DIRECTOR PACK but with a major difference. You don't have a printed framed artwork but an Original artwork signed by the artist!

BECOME A GAME DESIGNER IN OUR TEAM (+PLUS ART DIRECTOR PACK) ============================== Ever thought of working in a game studio? Take this unique opportunity to attend key game design meetings with the team (by Skype or in our office if you want to come to Paris at your own expenses), and help us design a puzzle or a level.\r\nAnd your name is credited in the team section AS GAME DESIGNER, not in the backers section!

BECOME A GIANT STATUE IN A IMPORTANT LEVEL (+PLUS ART DIRECTOR PACK) ============================== Ever thought of being in a game? Take this unique opportunity and become a giant statue in an important level of the game. And your name is credited in the team section, not in the backers section!

BECOME A CUSTOM CHARACTER OF THE GAME (+PLUS ART DIRECTOR PACK) \r\n============================== \r\nEver thought of being in a game? Take this unique opportunity to discuss with the team, explain us who you are, what your tastes and, with you, we will create a unique character inspired by you. And your name is credited in the team section, not in the backers section!

VISIT PARIS IN TAXI WITH THE TEAM & BECOME PART OF THE GAME ============================== Fancy visiting Paris, dining in a great French cuisine restaurant and spending good time with team? Take this unique opportunity to discuss with the team, explain us who you are, what your tastes are and, with you, we will create a unique character inspired by you. + All the rewards SIGNED by the director with your NAME. BOXED COPY OF THE GAME (Windows) + 1 DIGITAL COPY (ANY PLATFORM if its stretch goal is reached)+ 1 ORIGINAL FRAMED ARTWORK + 1 EXCLUSIVE LIMITED EDITION T-SHIRT Signed by the Taxi Journey Team + HARDCOVER ARTBOOK + DIGITAL COMPANION BOOK + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + PREMIER ACCESS TO THE PLAYABLE BETA + Your name in the credits in the Team section! Travel & lodging expenses not included.

VISIT PARIS IN TAXI WITH THE TEAM, BECOME PART OF THE GAME & GO BACK WITH 4 INCHES HAND-MADE MODELS OF GINO AND ZOEY ENGRAVED WITH YOUR NAME. ============================== Fancy visiting Paris, dining in a great French cuisine restaurant and spending good time with the team ? Take this unique opportunity to discuss with the team, explain us who you are, what are your tastes, what is your world and, with you, we will create a unique character inspired by you. + All the rewards SIGNED by the director with your NAME. BOXED COPY OF THE GAME (Windows) + 1 DIGITAL COPY (ANY PLATFORM if its stretch goal is reached)+ 1 ORIGINAL FRAMED ARTWORK + 1 EXCLUSIVE LIMITED EDITION T-SHIRT Signed by the Taxi Journey Team + HARDCOVER ARTBOOK + DIGITAL COMPANION BOOK + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + PREMIER ACCESS TO THE PLAYABLE BETA + Your name in the credits in the Team section! Travel & lodging expenses not included. And of course, you've got amazing models of Zoey and Gino, fully hand-made and painted, and engraved with your name.
